item.title: NEWS UPDATE! The VOID Build has been completed. If you are still using The Eldritch Build, it is strongly recommended that you upgrade to the VOID Build.
You will receive an email no later than March 25th explaining in detail how to upgrade. You will have until May 1st to upgrade.
IMPORTANT! After March 1st, the "Eldrich Repository", Builds, and Wizard will be deleted and replaced with "Kayn's Repository", the VOID build, and "Kayn's Wizard".
VOID Skin/Build updates were last made on March 20 2018. VOID Source updates were last made on March 19 2018.
Please email "kaynfiretvguru@gmail.com" for any issues you have with your build.
